languages.text: "Секретарь Ахиллеас... Еще на Даргонусе я отметила грязно-серые цепи, сковывающие его по рукам и ногам. В тот момент мне казалось, что он корит себя за атаку на мир-столицу. Если бы только я осмелилась хоть раз заговорить с ним об этом... Быть может, мы бы все избежали участи стать пленниками сего места".

"Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."
languages.original_text: "Секретарь Ахиллеас... Еще на Даргонусе я отметила грязно-серые цепи, сковывающие его по рукам и ногам. В тот момент мне казалось, что он корит себя за атаку на мир-столицу. Если бы только я осмелилась хоть раз заговорить с ним об этом... Быть может, мы бы все избежали участи стать пленниками сего места".

traits.locale_text: "Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I dared to speak to him about it just once... Maybe we would all be spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

languages.text: 「アキレアス長官…ダルゴナスに戻って、私は彼の腕と脚を縛り付けている汚れた灰色の鎖に気づきました。その瞬間、彼は首都惑星の攻撃について自分を責めているように見えたんです。一度でも彼にそのことを話す勇気があれば…もしかしたら、私たちは皆、この場所で囚人となる運命から免れることができたかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

traits.locale_text: 「アキレアス長官…ダルゴナスに戻って、私は彼の腕と脚を縛り付けている汚れた灰色の鎖に気づきました。その瞬間、彼は首都惑星の攻撃について自分を責めているように見えたんです。一度でも彼にそのことを話す勇気があれば…もしかしたら、私たちは皆、この場所で囚人となる運命から免れることができたかもしれません」

languages.text: “阿吉里亚斯……早在达戈努斯的时候，我就注意到了他的胳膊与腿上缠着污秽的灰色铁链。那个时候，我以为他是因为首都世界遭到袭击才这么自责。要是我那个时候能鼓起勇气，和他谈谈这件事请就好了……如果我真的那么做了，或许我们就不会沦为黑暗之城的囚徒了。”
languages.original_text: "Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

traits.locale_text: “阿吉里亚斯……早在达戈努斯的时候，我就注意到了他的胳膊与腿上缠着肮脏的灰色铁链。那个时候，我以为他是因为首都世界遭到袭击才这么自责。要是我鼓起勇气，和他谈谈这件事请就好了……如果我真的那么做了，或许我们就不会沦为黑暗之城的囚徒了。”

languages.text: «Secretario Achilleas... De vuelta en Dargonus me fijé en las sucias cadenas grises que le ataban brazos y piernas. En ese momento, me pareció que se culpaba por el ataque al mundo capital. Si tan solo me hubiera atrevido a sacar el tema... tal vez nos habríamos librado del destino de convertirnos en prisioneros en este lugar».
languages.original_text: "Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

traits.locale_text: «Secretario Achilleas... De vuelta en Dargonus me fijé en las sucias cadenas grises que le ataban brazos y piernas. En ese momento, me pareció que se culpaba por el ataque al mundo capital. Si tan solo me hubiera atrevido a sacar el tema... tal vez nos habríamos del destino de convertirnos en prisioneros en este lugar».

languages.text: "Sekretär Achilleas ... Auf Dargonus sind mir die schmutzigen grauen Ketten aufgefallen, mit denen er an Armen und Beinen gefesselt war. In dem Augenblick erschien es mir, als würde er sich selbst die Schuld an dem Angriff auf die Hauptwelt geben. Hätte ich doch nur einmal den Mut gehabt, mit ihm zu sprechen ... vielleicht wäre uns allen das Schicksal erspart geblieben, an diesem Ort gefangen zu sein."
languages.original_text: "Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

traits.locale_text: "Sekretär Achilleas ... Auf Dargonus sind mir die schmutzigen grauen Ketten aufgefallen, mit denen er an Armen und Beinen gefesselt war. In dem Augenblick erschien es mir, als würde er sich selbst die Schuld an dem Angriff auf die Hauptwelt geben. Hätte ich es doch nur gewagt, ihn nur ein einziges Mal darauf anzusprechen ... Vielleicht wäre uns dann allen das Schicksal erspart geblieben, hier als Gefangene zu enden."

languages.text: « Le secrétaire Achilleas... J'avais déjà remarqué sur Dargonus qu'il était entravé par des chaînes grises immondes. Sur le moment, j'ai cru qu'il se blâmait pour l'attaque sur le monde-capitale. Si seulement j'avais osé lui en parler, ne serait-ce qu'une fois... Nous ne serions sans doute pas prisonniers ici. »
languages.original_text: "Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

traits.locale_text: « Le secrétaire Achilleas... J'avais déjà remarqué sur Dargonus qu'il était entravé par des chaînes grises immondes. Sur le moment, j'ai cru qu'il se blâmait pour l'attaque sur le monde capitale. Si seulement j'avais osé lui en parler... Nous ne serions sans doute pas prisonniers ici. »

languages.text: "Yazman Achilleas. Dargonus'tayken kollarını ve bacaklarını bağlayan kirli, gri zincirleri fark etmiştim. O an başdünyaya düzenlenen saldırıdan ötürü kendisini suçluyor gibi gelmişti. Keşke bunu bir kez olsun onunla konuşabilme cesaretine sahip olsaydım. Belki o zaman burada birer mahkûm olmak zorunda kalmazdık."
languages.original_text: "Secretary Achilleas... Back on Dargonus, I noted the dirty grey chains that bound him around the arms and legs. At that moment, it seemed to me that he was blaming himself for the attack on the capital world. If only I'd had the courage to speak to him about it just once... perhaps we all would have been spared the fate of becoming prisoners in this place."

traits.locale_text: "Yazman Achilleas. Dargonus'tayken kollarını ve bacaklarını bağlayan kirli, gri zincirleri fark etmiştim. O an başdünyaya düzenlenen saldırı nedeniyle kendisini suçluyor gibi gelmişti. Keşke bunu bir kez olsun onunla konuşabilme cesaretine sahip olsaydım. Belki o zaman burada birer mahkûm olmak zorunda kalmazdık."
